description:
1. Acting Fumi
Mom and the gang have come to a theme park where the children learn about society and are challenged to do the jobs that they like. Fumi and Kanna are challenged to become fashion models, but...
2. Acting Bunji
The four silly boys, Bunji and his friends, take on the challenge of the fire brigade. After getting instructions that teamwork is important, they are off! As soon as that happens, Chi can`t get off the pole...
3. Reformed Dad
While Fumi and Dad are walking Jon, they meet with Kanna`s cool-looking dad in a suit. When Fumi sees that, she tells Daddy to wear something more decent, but...
4. Short
Bunji doesn`t quite like giving opinions for his reading homework. Maybe the book is too hard, and so Bunji goes on writing his opinion on poetry, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fashion Model Acting Fumi / Acting Bunji Teamwork / Reformed Dad / Short
なりきりふみ / チームワーク / とうさん改造 / みじかい
